data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Ancash, Peru to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ancash, Peru
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Ancash, Peru today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Ancash to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Father, help the 149,745 believers in Ancash to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Yora people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Ancash, Peru.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Ancash, Peru.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ancash, Peru has a population of 1,039,400.

We estimate Ancash has 149,745 people who might know Jesus, 827,921 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 61,734 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,039,400 citizens of Ancash, Peru, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.
